mapper.select: SELECT id, file_title, file_desc, file_url, contact_person, contact_phone, contact_wechat FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

SELECT t1.id, t1.file_title, t1.file_desc, t1.file_state, t1.publish_datetime, t1.create_time FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file t1 WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0 AND t1.rel_bureau_id = #{param1}
AND (t1.file_state = 'PUBLISHED' OR t1.file_state = 'HAVEREAD')
AND t1.file_title LIKE concat('%', #{param3.title}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param3.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param3.endDate}) <= 0

SELECT id, file_title, file_desc, file_url, file_state, contact_person, contact_phone, contact_wechat, publish_datetime, create_time FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file t1 INNER JOIN diyi_rel_bureau_service_provider t2 ON t1.rel_bureau_id = t2.rel_bureau_id WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND (t1.file_state = 'PUBLISHED' OR t1.file_state = 'HAVEREAD') AND t2.service_provider_id = #{param1} AND (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file_read WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND t1.id = rel_bureau_file_id AND servicer_provider_worker_id = #{param2}) <= 0

SELECT t1.id, t1.file_title AS title, t1.file_desc AS desc, t1.publish_datetime, IF((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file_read WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND rel_bureau_file_id = t1.id AND servicer_provider_worker_id = #{param2}) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_read FROM diyi_rel_bureau_file t1 INNER JOIN diyi_rel_bureau_service_provider t2 ON t1.rel_bureau_id = t2.rel_bureau_id AND t2.service_provider_id = #{param1} WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND (t1.file_state = 'PUBLISHED' OR t1.file_state = 'HAVEREAD')
